page.title: 08M/V RESEARCH LK 380
page.content: The{Research}is a purse_net boat. Built in Norway, 1982 she is 133'long and painted red.She is owned by her crew of 12. Herring and mackerel are her usual catch,pumped from the net into refrigerated sea-water tanks,capacity 330tonnes.With one shot of the net 60 tonnes may be caught.She fishes around Shetland,the Minch and off Cornwall as allowed by strict quotas that stop purse-net boats from over-fishing the sea.The catch may be landed in Denmark or sold to factory ships from Poland, E;Germany or Russia.The wheelhouse equipment is a fish meter,sonar,radar, compass,radio,steering wheel,throttle: deck equipment is a power block,chute, derrick,hydraulics and purse_net. This year (1985) there has been no quota from Jan.to June so no fishing all that time.
